info.name: ogmios
info.summary: Ogmios is a lightweight bridge interface for cardano-node. It offers a WebSockets API that enables local clients to speak Ouroboros' mini-protocols via JSON/RPC. ogmios-python is an Ogmios client written in Python.

info.name: ogmios
info.summary: Ogmios is a lightweight bridge interface for cardano-node. It offers a WebSockets API that enables local clients to speak Ouroboros' mini-protocols via JSON/RPC. ogmios-python is an Ogmios client written in Python designed for ease of use.
